20101201045325.333|20101201045328.667|CCO|    
20101201045328.667|20101201045352.000|CCO|      PROVEN BETTER ON PAIN.
20101201045352.000|20101201045353.250|CCO|    [ Male Announcer ] If you've

20101201045359.500|20101201045400.750|CCO|
20101201045400.750|20101201045402.000|CCO|    lurking, waiting to strike.
20101201045402.000|20101201045402.667|CCO|        
20101201045402.667|20101201045403.333|CCO|          A heart attack
20101201045403.333|20101201045404.000|CCO|    
20101201045404.000|20101201045404.667|CCO|    that's caused by a clot,
20101201045404.667|20101201045405.333|CCO|    
20101201045405.333|20101201045406.000|CCO|    one that could be fatal.
20101201045406.000|20101201045406.667|CCO|    But PLAVIX helps save lives.
20101201045406.667|20101201045407.333|CCO|    
20101201045407.333|20101201045408.000|CCO|          PLAVIX, taken with
20101201045408.000|20101201045408.667|CCO|    
20101201045408.667|20101201045409.333|CCO|      other heart medicines,
20101201045409.333|20101201045410.000|CCO|    
20101201045410.000|20101201045410.667|CCO|      goes beyond what other
20101201045410.667|20101201045411.333|CCO|
20101201045411.333|20101201045412.000|CCO|      heart medicines do alone,
20101201045412.000|20101201045412.588|CCO|  to provide greater protection
20101201045412.588|20101201045413.176|CCO|    
20101201045413.176|20101201045413.765|CCO|        against heart attack
20101201045413.765|20101201045414.353|CCO|    
20101201045414.353|20101201045414.941|CCO|    or stroke and even death
20101201045414.941|20101201045415.529|CCO|        
20101201045415.529|20101201045416.118|CCO|              by helping
20101201045416.118|20101201045416.706|CCO|    
20101201045416.706|20101201045417.294|CCO|    to keep blood platelets
20101201045417.294|20101201045417.882|CCO|

20101201045418.471|20101201045419.059|CCO|
20101201045419.059|20101201045419.647|CCO|    and forming dangerous clots.
20101201045419.647|20101201045420.235|CCO|        
20101201045420.235|20101201045420.824|CCO|        Ask your doctor
20101201045420.824|20101201045421.412|CCO|
20101201045421.412|20101201045422.000|CCO|    if PLAVIX is right for you.
20101201045422.000|20101201045422.769|CCO|

20101201045425.077|20101201045425.846|CCO|    
20101201045425.846|20101201045426.615|CCO|        [ Female Announcer ]
20101201045426.615|20101201045427.385|CCO|    
20101201045427.385|20101201045428.154|CCO|    Certain genetic factors
20101201045428.154|20101201045428.923|CCO|
